dc_description_s: The US Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) releases annual funding allocations for the programs administered by the Office of Community Planning and Development (CPD). These programs include: Community Development Block Grants (CDBG); HOME Investment Partnerships (HOME); Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA); and Emergency Shelter Grants (ESG).These datasets are mapped according to CPD‘s custom boundaries for Formula Allocations. Data are mapped to the most recent boundaries available. See: https://hudgis-hud.opendata.arcgis.com/
dc_creator_sm: Office of Community Planning and Development
US Department of Housing and Urban Development
